titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: URINE VANILLYLMANDELIC ACID CREATININE RATIO - Description

div.p: URINE VANILLYLMANDELIC ACID CREATININE RATIO is the result of the Clinical Investigation which measures the PATIENT's urine Vanillylmandelic Acid (VMA) creatinine ratio, which is used to evaluate catecholamine production, for the diagnosis of pheochromocytoma and neuroblastoma and in confirmation of elevated catecholamine levels.
The value is presented in the range 0.0 - 10.0.
